name: Pengi and the Polar Pirates
description:
Help Pengi save all penguins from the evil Polar Pirates! The Polar Pirates are terrorizing penguins all over the south pole. All efforts of stopping them has failed, and the penguins last hope rests in your flippers. Armed only with snowballs and whatever you may find on the road, you must slide your way through the frozen lands of the South and fight the pirates where ever you find them.

Save penguins for real if you donate here or buy the game for Android! 50% of our profits from this game will be donated to a worthy penguin charity. Why? Because while working with this game we learned that emperor penguins are an endangered species due to melting sea ice.
